TopicTitle: Before the big bang and black holes

Articles.Content:
Hi guys. My first post here now I am not a physician or any thing of sort but I had a theory for some time that I always thought was fun but now with hawking new theories on black holes... Well.. 

My theory was that our universe was created through a black hole.  

And most probably it could be a experiment (although it could as well be a just a natural..)  they  Universe that blackhole would connect to would be far bigger than ours and time would move at different pace than ours.   

A substance was moved into a void of nothingness in a different dimension   using a black hole  where big bang was set off.  A battle between nothingness and substance happens than as Universe expands and shrink back to nothingness again. 

Question is what was the intend of this experiment.  What would our role be...  Would that answer why we are here?  Or give us a escape route out of our universe and into our creators world???  

Anyway thanks for reading not sure why I thought of this except that I was bored I guess  but it's a interesting theory I think that might give some food fill r the thought.. 

Lately been thinking that it might actually not be other universes blackhole lead too but other time frames...
This bit of cosmological speculation has been moved to Science discussions.
